ygData.messageBody:
Thats what i was thinking also.\...now if we just could get some money :)

-joe

On Mon, 24 Jul 2000, David Lari wrote:

> Tell Rob to go for the RAM. I had 64 meg and went to 128 and it made all the
> difference in the world.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Joseph Normandin <josephn@...>
> To: <EQ_rainbow@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, July 24, 2000 3:51 PM
> Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Re: back to the horse & buggy :o(
>
>
> > Hey Melanie,
> >
> > you sound like me and rob, we love computers. They are fun to build :)
> > Unfortunatly we need mroe moneyfor our hobby. My computer is an athlon
> > 700 with 128M ram (very important for EQ i think) and a TNT2 ultra (32M)
> > video card. I'd like a new video card soon, I think the ATI radeon looks
> > fantastic. Poor rob has only a AMD K62-400 with 64M, and a voodoo3 2000
> > (used ot be mine but rob had problems with his TNT2 ultra so we switched),
> > you'd think that this configuarion would ROCK, but it dosnt. I think
> > another 64M ram would help him alot but he is dead set on getting a faster
> > processor than me ;) hehehhe
> >
> > -joe
